title: Integrative Medicine
description: Integrative medicine integrates complementary health approaches into mainstream healthcare. These therapies often help manage side effects with illnesses and diseases.
cleaned_text: complements traditional health care services and can help manage disease side effects. It is not a substitute for medical care with your cancer specialist or primary care provider. [Learn more about integrative medicine at the Dempsey Center.](https://www.dempseycenter.org/services/integrative-therapies/) Integrative medicine therapies: Examples of integrated medicine include: - Acupuncture - Reiki - Yoga and Tai Chi - Massage - Hypnotherapy - Homeopathy - Osteopathic manual medicine - Mind-body relaxation - Nutritional medicine - Herbal medicine
